name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Fluid Properties & Continuity
lessons.description: Density, viscosity, and the continuity equation for steady flows.

lessons.name: Bernoulli & Momentum Equations
lessons.description: Energy and momentum relations applied to simple aerodynamic systems.

lessons.name: Lift, Drag, and Airfoils
lessons.description: Definitions of lift/drag and basic airfoil characteristics.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Mach Number & Compressibility
lessons.description: Flow regimes and when compressibility effects matter.

lessons.name: Normal & Oblique Shocks
lessons.description: Shock relations and flow property changes across shocks.

lessons.name: Isentropic Flow & Nozzles
lessons.description: Area–Mach relations and converging–diverging nozzle behavior.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Stagnation Heating
lessons.description: Sources of heating and recovery temperature at the stagnation point.

lessons.name: Convective Heat Transfer
lessons.description: Boundary layers, heat-transfer coefficients, and correlations.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Ablative vs. reusable TPS concepts and materials.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Loads & Margins
lessons.description: Launch, acoustic, and on-orbit loads; factors of safety.

lessons.name: Materials & Joints
lessons.description: Aluminum, composites, fasteners, and bonding methods.

lessons.name: Vibration & Modal Analysis
lessons.description: Structural dynamics and qualification testing basics.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Two-Body Motion
lessons.description: Kepler’s laws, orbital elements, and conic sections.

lessons.name: Delta-V & Transfers
lessons.description: Hohmann transfers, plane changes, and phasing orbits.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Subsystem Overview
lessons.description: Power, thermal, ADCS, comms, and propulsion roles.

lessons.name: Interfaces & ICDs
lessons.description: Mechanical, electrical, and data interfaces and control documents.

lessons.name: Verification & Validation
lessons.description: Test plans, requirements traceability, and V-model.

name: Structure & Bonding
description: Hybridization, resonance, functional groups, and 3D molecular structure.

name: Reaction Mechanisms
description: Foundational organic mechanisms and arrow-pushing practice.

name: Spectroscopy & Structure Determination
description: IR, NMR, and MS for organic structure elucidation.

name: Coordination Chemistry
description: Ligands, geometries, oxidation states, chelation.

name: Crystal & Ligand Field Theory
description: d-orbital splitting, CFSE, and magnetic properties.

name: Inorganic Synthesis & Characterization
description: Bench techniques and spectroscopy for inorganics.

name: Thermodynamics
description: Gibbs energy, equilibrium, and phase behavior.

lessons.name: State Functions
lessons.description: U, H, S, G and relationships.

name: Chemical Kinetics
description: Rate laws, mechanisms, and Arrhenius analysis.

name: Quantum Chemistry
description: Wavefunctions, molecular orbitals, and spectroscopy.

name: Quenya Grammar Basics
description: Intro to phonology, cases, and verb conjugations in Quenya.

name: Sindarin Vocabulary & Syntax
description: Core lexicon and common sentence patterns in Sindarin.

name: Writing Systems of Middle-earth
description: Tengwar and Cirth usage across cultures and eras.

name: Foundations of Inter-species Diplomacy
description: Principles of negotiation among Elves, Men, Dwarves, and Wizards.

name: Historical Alliances & Treaties
description: Survey of alliances and their strategic implications.

name: Conflict Resolution & Strategy
description: From de-escalation to coalition building in Middle-earth.
